SELECT to_char(log_time, 'YYYY-MM') AS month, user_id, COUNT(*) AS poop_count FROM poop_log WHERE is_deleted = false
AND to_char(log_time, 'YYYY-MM') = #{startMonth}
AND log_time >= to_date(#{startMonth}, 'YYYY-MM')
AND log_time <= to_date(#{endMonth}, 'YYYY-MM')
GROUP BY month, user_id ORDER BY month, user_id
